TEXT.Chinese: 你要什么来交换这些？

TEXT.English: Please, accept this gift.
TEXT.Chinese: 请接受这件礼物。

TEXT.English: Never mind...
TEXT.Chinese: 没关系……

TEXT.English: We would like to make a trade proposal.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们希望进行一笔交易。

TEXT.English: What would make this deal work?
TEXT.Chinese: 怎么样才能达成这交易呢？

TEXT.English: What will you give me for this?
TEXT.Chinese: 对于这些，你能和我换什么？

TEXT.English: Lets stop this pointless fighting and declare peace!
TEXT.Chinese: 让我们停止这无意义的战斗，恢复和平！

TEXT.English: Let us bury the hatchet. What is the price for peace?
TEXT.Chinese: 让我们铸剑为犁。换取和平的代价是什么？

TEXT.English: What are the current deals we have together?
TEXT.Chinese: 我们目前签订有哪些协议？

TEXT.English: Could you spare this for a good friend?
TEXT.Chinese: 你能将这些赠给一个好朋友吗？

TEXT.English: We demand that you give this to us in tribute.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们要求你向我们进贡这些。

TEXT.English: This sure would come in handy...
TEXT.Chinese: 这肯定得心应手……

TEXT.English: Sounds like a deal!!!
TEXT.Chinese: 看来是笔好交易！！！

TEXT.English: It ain't happening.
TEXT.Chinese: 那不会发生的。

TEXT.English: Care to negotiate?
TEXT.Chinese: 我们来谈判吧？

TEXT.English: Fair enough. (exit)
TEXT.Chinese: 够公平了。（结束）

TEXT.English: Sure! We're always glad to help!
TEXT.Chinese: 当然！我们一直乐于助人！

TEXT.English: Sorry, but it's no rose garden over here either.
TEXT.Chinese: 对不起，但是这里也没有玫瑰花园。

TEXT.English: Well, if you insist...
TEXT.Chinese: 好吧，既然你坚持……

TEXT.English: We reject your empty threats!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们拒绝你空洞的威胁！

TEXT.English: I agree. We will convert to [OUR_STATE_RELIGION] immediately. (Convert Religion)
TEXT.Chinese: 我同意。我们将立刻改信[OUR_STATE_RELIGION]。（转变信仰）

TEXT.English: Our people will never give up their beliefs.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的人民永远不会放弃他们的信仰。

TEXT.English: But of course... we now see the error of our ways. (Start Revolution)
TEXT.Chinese: 但是当然……我们发现走错路了。（发动革命）

TEXT.English: You must learn to respect our differences.
TEXT.Chinese: 你应该求同存异。

TEXT.English: Let's get this war started! (Declare War)
TEXT.Chinese: 好，打仗了！（宣战）

TEXT.English: Sorry, but we cannot afford a war right now.
TEXT.Chinese: 对不起，但我们现在实在没法打仗。

TEXT.English: You're right, we can't stand them either! (Cancel Deals)
TEXT.Chinese: 你是对的，我们不能这样了！（取消交易）

TEXT.English: Sorry, but we just can't turn our back on them.
TEXT.Chinese: 抱歉，我们不会背弃他们的。

TEXT.English: Let's discuss something else...
TEXT.Chinese: 我们谈点别的吧……

TEXT.English: We would like you to research...
TEXT.Chinese: 我们想让你研究……

TEXT.English: What do you think of...
TEXT.Chinese: 你怎么看……

TEXT.English: Why don't you attack...
TEXT.Chinese: 你何不进攻……

TEXT.English: Farewell ... (Exit)
TEXT.Chinese: 再见……（结束）

TEXT.English: %s1 is a scourge on our world! (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: %s1是我们这个世界苦难的根源！（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: %s1 is a snake in the grass! Do not trust [NUM1:him:her:x:x]! (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: %s1是草丛里的蛇！别相信[NUM1:他:她:x:x]！（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: I neither like nor trust %s1. (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: 我不喜欢也不信任%s1。（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: A despicable villain! (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: 此人是个卑鄙的恶棍！（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: %s1 is a deceitful cretin! (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: %s1是个狡诈的白痴！（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: %s1 is dead to me! (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: %s1就是个死人！（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: %s1 is a very bad person. (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: %s1是个大坏蛋。（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: %s1? A treacherous cowardly baboon. (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: %s1？一个背信弃义的懦夫。（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: %s1 is not worth a bucket of owl spit. (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: %s1是个狗屁不值的家伙。（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: %s1 is evil through and through! (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: %s1是彻头彻尾的恶棍！（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: %s1 is a dirty, rotten scoundrel! (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: %s1是个肮脏堕落的无赖！（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: %s1 is a nasty piece of work, if you want my opinion! (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: %s1是个下流东西，这就是我的看法！（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: Not to be trusted at all. (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: 此人完全不可信赖。（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: Do not mention that creature's name in my presence! (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: 别在我面前提那个畜牲的名字！（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: %s1 is a rat fink. (Furious)
TEXT.Chinese: %s1是只猪猡。（狂怒的）

TEXT.English: We're becoming increasingly frustrated with %s1's behavior! (Annoyed)
